title: I GOT LEAVEBUSTED FOR A GAME I COULDNT CONNECT TO!!!

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: It isn't even just me, like 5 people in total I don't deserve a low priority queue when it is the server messing up. I tried playing a match before this one and the same thing happened, but only 2 people got into that game.  Something needs to be done about this.

replies.body: It's great you are aware of and have mostly fixed the connection issues; but what are you doing about compensating the hundreds or even thousands of players that have lost LP, promos, etc? The problem persisted now for about 12 hours -- the whole day -- and not once was loss prevention enabled. Where is the compensation for those of us who had our time and efforts wasted and lost a lot of ranked game progress due to an error on your end?

Same happened to me but it was in ascension. Got the leaverbuster even though almost no one connected. Confused on Riot's Lack of communication here. there seems to be quite a few articles about people getting banned because of it

I also couldn't reconnect, I'm sad because I was winning streak in a ranked {{item:3151}}
